arabicText: وَإِذَا سَمِعُوا۟ مَآ أُنزِلَ إِلَى ٱلرَّسُولِ تَرَىٰٓ أَعْيُنَهُمْ تَفِيضُ مِنَ ٱلدَّمْعِ مِمَّا عَرَفُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلْحَقِّ ۖ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَآ ءَامَنَّا فَٱكْتُبْنَا مَعَ ٱلشَّـٰهِدِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 when	 they	 listen	 to	 what	 has	 been	
sent	 down	 to	 the	 Noble	 Messenger	
(Prophet	Muhammad - peace	and	blessings	
be	 upon	 him),	 you	 observe	 their	 eyes	
overflowing	with	tears	because	they	have	
recognised	the	truth;	they	say,	“Our	Lord,	
we	have	accepted	 faith	- therefore	record	
us	among	the	witnesses	of	the	truth.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jab	sunte	haiñ	woh	jo	Rasool	ki	 taraf	
utrā	to	unki āañkheñ		dekho	ke	Āañsuaoñ	
se	 ubal	 rahi	 haiñ	 is	 liye	 ke	 woh	 Haq	 ko	
pahchān	gaye	kahte	haiñ	aey	Rab	hamāre!	
hum	Imān		lāye	tu	hameiñ	haq	ke gawahoñ	
me	likh	le.

arabicText: وَمَا لَنَا لَا نُؤْمِنُ بِٱللَّهِ وَمَا جَآءَنَا مِنَ ٱلْحَقِّ وَنَطْمَعُ أَن يُدْخِلَنَا رَبُّنَا مَعَ ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ
englishTranslationText:
“And	what	is	 the	matter	with	 us,	 that	we	
should	not	believe	in	Allah and	 this	 truth	
which	has	come	 to	us?	And	we	hope	 that	
our	 Lord	 will	 admit	 us	 along	 with	 the	
righteous.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	hameiñ	kyā	huā	ke	hum	Imān na	layeñ	
Allah	par	aur	us Haq	par	ke hamāre	pās	āyā	
aur	 hum	 tam'a	 karte	 haiñ	 ke	 hameiñ	
hamārā	Rab	nek	logoñ	ke	sāth	dākhil	kare.

arabicText: فَأَثَـٰبَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِمَا قَالُوا۟ جَنَّـٰتٍۢ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا ۚ وَذَٰلِكَ جَزَآءُ ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
englishTranslationText:
So	because	of	their	saying,	Allah bestowed	
them	 with	 Gardens	 beneath	 which	 rivers	
flow,	in	which	they	will	abide	forever;	and	
this	is	the	reward	of	the	virtuous.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	Allah	ne	un	ke	is	kahne	ke	badle	inheñ	
bāgh	 diye	 jin	 ke	 neeche	 nahreñ	 rawañ	
hameshā	 un	 me	 raheñge	 yeh	 badlā	 hai	
nekoñ	ka

arabicText: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَكَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَآ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
englishTranslationText:
And	those	who	disbelieved	and	denied	Our	
signs,	are	the	people	of	hell.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	Allah	ne	un	ke	is	kahne	ke	badle	inheñ	
Aur	jinhoñ	ne	kufr	kiyā	aur	hamāri	āyateñ	
jhutlāyieñ	woh	haiñ	dozakh	wāle

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ لَا تُحَرِّمُوا۟ طَيِّبَـٰتِ مَآ أَحَلَّ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمْ وَلَا تَعْتَدُوٓا۟ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلْمُعْتَدِينَ
englishTranslationText:
O	 People	 who	 Believe!	 Do	 not	 forbid	 the	
pure	 things,	which	Allah has	made	lawful	
for	you,	and	do	not	cross	the	limits;	indeed	
Allah dislikes	the	transgressors
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	 Imān wālo!	 harām	 na	 thahrāo	 woh	
suthari	cheezieñ	ke	Allah	ne	tumhāre	liye	
halāl	 kieñ	 aur	 had	 se	 na	 badho, be-shak		
had	 se	 badhne	 wāle	 Allah	 ko	 na	 pasand	
haiñ

arabicText: وَكُلُوا۟ مِمَّا رَزَقَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ حَلَـٰلًۭا طَيِّبًۭا ۚ وَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنتُم بِهِۦ مُؤْمِنُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Eat	 of	 the	 sustenance	 which	 Allah has	
given	 you,	 the	 lawful	 and	 the	 pure	- and	
fear	Allah in	Whom	you	believe.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	khāo	jo	kuchh	Allah	ne	tumheñ		rozi	di	
halāl	pākeezah	aur	daro	Allah	se	jis	par	tumheñ	Imān hai

arabicText: لَا يُؤَاخِذُكُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِٱللَّغْوِ فِىٓ أَيْمَـٰنِكُمْ وَلَـٰكِن يُؤَاخِذُكُم بِمَا عَقَّدتُّمُ ٱلْأَيْمَـٰنَ ۖ فَكَفَّـٰرَتُهُۥٓ إِطْعَامُ عَشَرَةِ مَسَـٰكِينَ مِنْ أَوْسَطِ مَا تُطْعِمُونَ أَهْلِيكُمْ أَوْ كِسْوَتُهُمْ أَوْ تَحْرِيرُ رَقَبَةٍۢ ۖ فَمَن لَّمْ يَجِدْ فَصِيَامُ ثَلَـٰثَةِ أَيَّامٍۢ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ كَفَّـٰرَةُ أَيْمَـٰنِكُمْ إِذَا حَلَفْتُمْ ۚ وَٱحْفَظُوٓا۟ أَيْمَـٰنَكُمْ ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يُبَيِّنُ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمْ ءَايَـٰتِهِۦ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَشْكُرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Allah does	not	take	you	to	task	for	oaths	which	are	made	unintentionally	but	He	does	take	you	to	
task	for	oaths	which	you	ratify;	so	the	redemption	of	such	oaths	is	to	provide	food	to	ten	needy	
persons	equal	to	the	average	of	what	you	feed	your	family,	or	to	clothe	them,	or	to	free	one	slave;	
and	for	one	who	has	no	means,	is	the	fasting	for	three	days;	this	is	the	redemption	of	your	oaths	
when	you	have	sworn;	and	fulfil	your	oaths;	this	is	how	Allah explains	His	verses	to	you,	so	that	
you	may	be	thankful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Allah	tumheñ		nahi		pakdta	tumhāri	ghalat	fahmi	ki	qasmoñ	par	hāñ	un	qasmoñ	par	girift	farmātā	
hai	jinheñ	tum	ne	mazboot	kiyā	to	aisi	qasam	ka	badla	das	miskeenoñ	ko	khānā	denā	apne	ghar	
wāloñ	ko	jo	khilāte	ho	us	ke	ausat	me	se	yā	unheñ	kapde	denā	yā	ek	bardā (ghulām)	aazād	karnā	
to	jo	in	me	se	kuchh	na	pāye	to	teen	din	ke	roze	yeh	badla	hai tumhāri	qasmoñ	ka	jab	qasam	khāo	
aur	apni	qasmoñ	ki	hifāzat	karo	isi	tarah	Allah	tum	se	apni	āyatieñ	bayān	farmāta	hai	ke	kahiñ	
tum	ahsān	māno

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِنَّمَا ٱلْخَمْرُ وَٱلْمَيْسِرُ وَٱلْأَنصَابُ وَٱلْأَزْلَـٰمُ رِجْسٌۭ مِّنْ عَمَلِ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنِ فَٱجْتَنِبُوهُ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُفْلِحُونَ
englishTranslationText:
O	 People	 who	 Believe!	 Wine	 (all	
intoxicants),	and	gambling,	and	idols,	and	
the	darts	are	impure	- the	works	of	Satan,	
therefore	keep	avoiding	them	so	that	you	
may	succeed
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	Imān	wālo!	Sharāb	aur	juñwā	aur	but	
aur	pāñse	nāpāk	hi	haiñ	shaitāni	kām	to	in	
se	bachte	rahnā	ke	tum	se	falah	pāo.

arabicText: إِنَّمَا يُرِيدُ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ أَن يُوقِعَ بَيْنَكُمُ ٱلْعَدَٰوَةَ وَٱلْبَغْضَآءَ فِى ٱلْخَمْرِ وَٱلْمَيْسِرِ وَيَصُدَّكُمْ عَن ذِكْرِ ٱللَّهِ وَعَنِ ٱلصَّلَوٰةِ ۖ فَهَلْ أَنتُم مُّنتَهُونَ
englishTranslationText:
The	 devil	 only	 seeks	 to	 instil	 hatred	 and	
enmity	 between	 you	 with	 wine	 and	
gambling,	 and	 to	 prevent	 you	 from	 the	
remembrance	of	Allah and	from	prayer;	so	
have	you	desisted?
romanUrduTranslationText:
Shaitān	yahi	chāhtā	hai	ke	tum	me	bair	aur	
dushmani	dalwa	de	sharāb	aur	juweñ	me	
aur	 tumheiñ	 Allah	 ki	 yād	 aur	 Namāz	 se	
roke	to	kyā	tum	b'az	āye?

arabicText: وَأَطِيعُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُوا۟ ٱلرَّسُولَ وَٱحْذَرُوا۟ ۚ فَإِن تَوَلَّيْتُمْ فَٱعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّمَا عَلَىٰ رَسُولِنَا ٱلْبَلَـٰغُ ٱلْمُبِينُ
englishTranslationText:
And	 obey	 Allah and	 obey	 the	 Noble	
Messenger,	 and	 be	 cautious;	 then	 if	 you	
turn	 away,	 so	 know	 that	 the	 duty	 of	 Our	
Noble	Messenger	is	only	to	plainly	convey	
the	message.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	hukm	māno	Allah	kā	aur	hukm	māno	
Rasool	kā	aur	hoshiyār	raho	phir	agar	tum	
phir	 jāo	 to	 jān	 lo	 ke	 hamāre	 Rasool	 kā	
zimmah	 sirf	 wazeh	 tour	 par	 hukm	
pahuñchā	denā	hai	.

arabicText: لَيْسَ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ جُنَاحٌۭ فِيمَا طَعِمُوٓا۟ إِذَا مَا ٱتَّقَوا۟ وَّءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ ثُمَّ ٱتَّقَوا۟ وَّءَامَنُوا۟ ثُمَّ ٱتَّقَوا۟ وَّأَحْسَنُوا۟ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ يُحِبُّ ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Upon	 those	 who	 accepted	 faith	 and	 did	
good	 deeds,	 there	 shall	 be	 no	 sin	 for	
whatever	they	have	consumed	in	the	past,	
provided	they	fear	and	continue	to	believe	
and	 do	 good	 deeds,	 then	 again	 fear	 and	
continue	 to	 believe,	 and	 then	 again	 fear	
and	 remain	 virtuous;	 and	Allah loves	 the	
virtuous.	.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Jo	 Imān	 lāye	 aur	 nek	 	 kām	 kiye	 un	 par	
kuchh	gunāh	 nahi	 hai	jo	 kuchh	unhoñ	 ne	
chakhā	jab	ke	dareñ	aur	Imān		rakhieñ	aur	
nekiyān	 kareñ	 phir	 dareñ	 aur	 Imān		
rakhieñ	aur	phir	dareñ	aur	nek		raheñ	aur	
Allah	nekoñ	ko	dost	rakhtā	ha

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ لَيَبْلُوَنَّكُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِشَىْءٍۢ مِّنَ ٱلصَّيْدِ تَنَالُهُۥٓ أَيْدِيكُمْ وَرِمَاحُكُمْ لِيَعْلَمَ ٱللَّهُ مَن يَخَافُهُۥ بِٱلْغَيْبِ ۚ فَمَنِ ٱعْتَدَىٰ بَعْدَ ذَٰلِكَ فَلَهُۥ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
O	 People	 who	 Believe!	 Allah will	 surely	
test	 you	 with	 some	 prey	 that	 is	 within	
reach	 of	 your	 hands	 and	 your	 spears,	 so	
that	 Allah may	 make	 known	 those	 who	
fear	Him	without	seeing;	so	henceforth,	a	
painful	 punishment	 is	 for	 anyone	 who	
transgresses.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	 Imān wālo!	 zaroor	 Allah	 	 tumheñ		
āzmāyegā	 aise	 b'az	 shikār	 se	 jis	 tak	
tumhāre	hāth	aur	neze	pahuñche		ke	Allah	
pahchān	karā	de	un	ki jo	us	se	bin	dekhe	
darte	haiñ	phir	is	ke	b’ad	jo	had	se	badhe	
us	ke	liye	dard-nāk	sazā	hai	.

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ لَا تَقْتُلُوا۟ ٱلصَّيْدَ وَأَنتُمْ حُرُمٌۭ ۚ وَمَن قَتَلَهُۥ مِنكُم مُّتَعَمِّدًۭا فَجَزَآءٌۭ مِّثْلُ مَا قَتَلَ مِنَ ٱلنَّعَمِ يَحْكُمُ بِهِۦ ذَوَا عَدْلٍۢ مِّنكُمْ هَدْيًۢا بَـٰلِغَ ٱلْكَعْبَةِ أَوْ كَفَّـٰرَةٌۭ طَعَامُ مَسَـٰكِينَ أَوْ عَدْلُ ذَٰلِكَ صِيَامًۭا لِّيَذُوقَ وَبَالَ أَمْرِهِۦ ۗ عَفَا ٱللَّهُ عَمَّا سَلَفَ ۚ وَمَنْ عَادَ فَيَنتَقِمُ ٱللَّهُ مِنْهُ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَزِيزٌۭ ذُو ٱنتِقَامٍ
englishTranslationText:
O	People	who Believe!	Do	not	kill	prey	while	you	are	on	the	pilgrimage;	and	whoever	among	you	
kills	 it	 intentionally,	 so	 its	 recompense	 is	 that	 he	 shall	 give	 a	 similar	 domestic	 animal	 (for	
sacrifice),	two	honest	men	among	you	rendering	the	command,	the	sacrifice	being brought	to	the	
Kaa’bah	- or	he	gives	as	redemption,	food	for	some	needy	persons,	or	fasts	for	the	same	number	
of	days,	so	that	he	may	taste	the	consequences	of	his	deed;	Allah has	forgiven	what	has	passed;	
and	henceforth	whoever	does	it,	Allah will	 take	recompense	 from	him;	and	Allah is	Almighty,	
Avenger.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	 Imān	wālo!	 Shikār	 na	 māro	 jab	 tum	
ehrām	me	ho	aur	tum	me	jo	usse	qasadan	qatal	kare	to	is	ka	badla	yeh	hai	ke	waisā	hi	jānwar	
maweshi	se	de	tum	me	ke	do	siqa'h	ādmi	is	ka	hukm	kare	yeh	qurbāni	ho	k'abah	ko	pahuñchti	yā	
kaffāra	de	chand	miskeenoñ	kā	khāna	yā	is	ke	barābar	roze	ke	apne	kām	kā	wabāl	chakhe	Allah	
ne	mu'āf	kiyā	jo	ho	guzrā	aur	jo	ab	karegā	Allah	us	se	badlā	legā	aur	Allah	gālib	hai	badlā	lene	
wālā

arabicText: أُحِلَّ لَكُمْ صَيْدُ ٱلْبَحْرِ وَطَعَامُهُۥ مَتَـٰعًۭا لَّكُمْ وَلِلسَّيَّارَةِ ۖ وَحُرِّمَ عَلَيْكُمْ صَيْدُ ٱلْبَرِّ مَا دُمْتُمْ حُرُمًۭا ۗ وَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ ٱلَّذِىٓ إِلَيْهِ تُحْشَرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
It	is	lawful	for	you	to	hunt	from	the	sea	and	
to	eat	from	it,	for	your	benefit	and	that	of	
the	 travellers;	 and	 hunting	 on	 land	 is	
forbidden	 for	 you	 while	 you	 are	 on	 the	
pilgrimage;	and	fear	Allah,	towards	Whom	
you	will	arise.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Halāl	hai	tumhāre	liye	dariyā	kā	shikār	aur
us	 kā	 khānā	 tumhāre	 aur	 musāfiroñ	 ke	
fā'yide	ko	aur	tum	par	harām	hai	khushki	
kā	 shikār	 jab	 tak	 tum	 ehrām	 me	 ho	 aur	
Allah	se	daro	jis	ki	taraf	tumheñ		uthnā	hai.

arabicText: ۞ جَعَلَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْكَعْبَةَ ٱلْبَيْتَ ٱلْحَرَامَ قِيَـٰمًۭا لِّلنَّاسِ وَٱلشَّهْرَ ٱلْحَرَامَ وَٱلْهَدْىَ وَٱلْقَلَـٰٓئِدَ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ لِتَعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعْلَمُ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍ عَلِيمٌ
englishTranslationText:
Allah has	made	the	Kaa’bah,	the	respected	
house,	a	cause	for	peoples	survival,	and	the	
Sacred	 Month,	 and	 the	 sacrifices	 in	 the	
holy	land,	and	the	garlanded	animals;	this	
is	so	that	you	may	be	convinced	that	Allah
knows	all	whatever	is	in	the	heavens	and	
all	whatever	is	in	the	earth,	and	that	Allah
is	the	All	Knowing
romanUrduTranslationText:
Allah	ne	adab	wāle	ghar	Kābe ko	logoñ	ke	
qiyām	 kā	 bā'is	 kiyā	 aur	 hurmat	 wāle	
mahine	aur	haram	ki	qurbāni	aur	gale	me	
alāmat	āwezañ	jānwaroñ	ko	yeh	is	liye	ke	
tum	 yaqeen	 karo	 ke	 Allah	 jāntā	 hai	 jo	
kuchh	 āasmān	 	 oñ	 me	 hai	 aur	 jo	 kuchh	
zameen	 me	 aur	 yeh	 ke	 	 Allah	 sab	 kuchh	
jāntā	hai.

arabicText: ٱعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ شَدِيدُ ٱلْعِقَابِ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٌۭ رَّحِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Know	 well	 that	 Allah’s	 punishment	 is	
severe,	 and	 that	 Allah is	 Oft	 Forgiving,	
Most	Merciful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Jān	rakho	ke	Allah	kā	‘aƶāb	sakht	hai	aur	
Allah	bakhsh	ne	wālā maherbān	.

arabicText: مَّا عَلَى ٱلرَّسُولِ إِلَّا ٱلْبَلَـٰغُ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ يَعْلَمُ مَا تُبْدُونَ وَمَا تَكْتُمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
There	 is	 no	 duty	 upon	 the	 Noble	
Messenger	except	to	convey	the	command;	
and	Allah knows	all	what	you	disclose	and	
all	what	you	hide.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Rasool	par	nahi	magar	hukm	pahuñchānā	
aur	Allah	jāntā	hai	jo	tum	zāhir	karte	aur	jo	
tum	chhupāte	ho.

arabicText: قُل لَّا يَسْتَوِى ٱلْخَبِيثُ وَٱلطَّيِّبُ وَلَوْ أَعْجَبَكَ كَثْرَةُ ٱلْخَبِيثِ ۚ فَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ يَـٰٓأُو۟لِى ٱلْأَلْبَـٰبِ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُفْلِحُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Say,	“The	impure	(evil)	and	the	pure	(good)	
are	not	equal,	even	though	the	abundance	
of	 the	impure	may	 attract	 you;	 therefore	
keep	 fearing	Allah,	 O	men	 of	intellect,	 so	
that	you	may	succeed.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	farmā	do	ke	suthrā	aur	gandah	barābar	nahi	agarche	tujhe	gandhe	ki	kasarat	bhāye	to	Allah	
se	darte	raho	Aey	aql	wālo!	ke	tum	falāh	pāo	.

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ لَا تَسْـَٔلُوا۟ عَنْ أَشْيَآءَ إِن تُبْدَ لَكُمْ تَسُؤْكُمْ وَإِن تَسْـَٔلُوا۟ عَنْهَا حِينَ يُنَزَّلُ ٱلْقُرْءَانُ تُبْدَ لَكُمْ عَفَا ٱللَّهُ عَنْهَا ۗ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورٌ حَلِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
O	 People	 who	 Believe!	 Do	 not	 ask	 about	
matters	which,	if	disclosed	to	you,	would	be	disliked	by	you;	and	if	you	ask	about	them	while	the	
Qur’an	is	being	sent	down,	they	will	be	disclosed	to	you;	Allah has	forgiven	these;	and	Allah is	Oft	
Forgiving,	Most	Forbearing.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	Imān wālo!	Aisi	bātieñ	na	puñchho	jo	tum	par	zāhir	ki	jāyeñ	to	tumheñ		buri	lageñ	aur	unhieñ	
us	waqt	puñchoge	ke	Qur'ān	utar	rahā	hai	 to	 tum	par	zāhir	kar	di	jāyeñgi Allah	unheiñ	mu’āf		
farmā	chukā	hai	aur	Allah	bakhsh	ne wālā	hilm wālā	hai

arabicText: قَدْ سَأَلَهَا قَوْمٌۭ مِّن قَبْلِكُمْ ثُمَّ أَصْبَحُوا۟ بِهَا كَـٰفِرِينَ
englishTranslationText: A	nation	before	you	asked	about	such	matters	and	then	disbelieved	in	them.
romanUrduTranslationText: Tum	me	se	agli	ek	qaum	ne	unhieñ	pooñchā	phir	un	se	munkir	ho	baithe.

arabicText: مَا جَعَلَ ٱللَّهُ مِنۢ بَحِيرَةٍۢ وَلَا سَآئِبَةٍۢ وَلَا وَصِيلَةٍۢ وَلَا حَامٍۢ ۙ وَلَـٰكِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ يَفْتَرُونَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ٱلْكَذِبَ ۖ وَأَكْثَرُهُمْ لَا يَعْقِلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Allah has	not	appointed	(commanded	to	sacrifice)	the	camel	with	ears	sliced	(Bahira)	or	the	shecamel	(Saibah)	 or	 the	 she-goat	(Wasilah)	 or	 the	 breeding	 camel	(Hami),	 but	 the	 disbelievers	
fabricate	lies	against	Allah;	and	most	of	them	do	not	have	any	sense	at	all.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Allah	ne	muqarrar	nahi	kiyā	hai	kān	chira	huā	aur	na	bijār	aur	na	wasilā	aur	na	hāmi	hāñ	kāfir	
log	Allah	par	jhutā	iftrā	bāñdhte	haiñ	aur	un	me	aksar	nir’e be-‘aql	haiñ.

arabicText: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ تَعَالَوْا۟ إِلَىٰ مَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ وَإِلَى ٱلرَّسُولِ قَالُوا۟ حَسْبُنَا مَا وَجَدْنَا عَلَيْهِ ءَابَآءَنَآ ۚ أَوَلَوْ كَانَ ءَابَآؤُهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ شَيْـًۭٔا وَلَا يَهْتَدُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 when	 it	 is	 said	 to	 them,	 “Come	
towards	 what	 Allah has	 sent	 down	 and	
towards	 the	 Noble	 Messenger”,	 they	 say,	
“Sufficient	 for	 us	 is	 what	 we	 found	 our	
forefathers	upon”;	even	if	their	forefathers	
did	not	have	knowledge	nor	had	guidance?
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jab	un	se	kahā	jāye	āo		is	taraf jo	Allah	
ne	utārā	aur	Rasool	ki	taraf	kahiñ	hamieñ	
woh	 bahut	 hai	 jis	 par	 hum	 ne	 apne	 bāp	
dādā	ko	pāyā	kyā	agarche	un	ke	bāp	dādā	
ne	na	kuchh	jāne	aur	na	rāh	par	hoñ	.

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ عَلَيْكُمْ أَنفُسَكُمْ ۖ لَا يَضُرُّكُم مَّن ضَلَّ إِذَا ٱهْتَدَيْتُمْ ۚ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ مَرْجِعُكُمْ جَمِيعًۭا فَيُنَبِّئُكُم بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
O	People	who	Believe!	Fear	 for	your	own	
souls;	he	who	has	strayed	cannot	harm	you	
in	the	least	if	you	are	on	guidance;	towards	
Allah only	you	will	all	return	- He	will	then	
inform	you	of	what	you	used	to	do
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	 Imān wālo! Tum	 apni	 fikr	 rakho	
tumhārā	kuchh	na	bigādegā	jo	gumrāh	huā	
jab	 ke	 tum rāh	 par	 ho	 tum	 sab	 ki	 Ruju’	
Allah	hi	ki	taraf	hai	phir	woh	tumheñ		batā	
degā		jo	tum	karte	the

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ شَهَـٰدَةُ بَيْنِكُمْ إِذَا حَضَرَ أَحَدَكُمُ ٱلْمَوْتُ حِينَ ٱلْوَصِيَّةِ ٱثْنَانِ ذَوَا عَدْلٍۢ مِّنكُمْ أَوْ ءَاخَرَانِ مِنْ غَيْرِكُمْ إِنْ أَنتُمْ ضَرَبْتُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ فَأَصَـٰبَتْكُم مُّصِيبَةُ ٱلْمَوْتِ ۚ تَحْبِسُونَهُمَا مِنۢ بَعْدِ ٱلصَّلَوٰةِ فَيُقْسِمَانِ بِٱللَّهِ إِنِ ٱرْتَبْتُمْ لَا نَشْتَرِى بِهِۦ ثَمَنًۭا وَلَوْ كَانَ ذَا قُرْبَىٰ ۙ وَلَا نَكْتُمُ شَهَـٰدَةَ ٱللَّهِ إِنَّآ إِذًۭا لَّمِنَ ٱلْـَٔاثِمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
O	 People	 who	 Believe!	 The	 witnesses	
between	you	when	death	approaches	any	
one	 of	 you,	 at	 the	 time	 of	 making	 a	 will,	
should	 be	 two	 reliable	 men	 from	 among	
you,	or	two	from	another	tribe	in	case	you	
are	travelling	in	the	land	and	the	event	of	
death	approaches	you;	engage	 them	after	
the	 prayers,	 and	 if	 you	 doubt,	 they	 must	
swear	 by	 Allah that,	 “We	 shall	 not	
exchange	our	oaths	for	any	price	even	if	he	
is	 a	 near	 relative,	 nor	 will	 we	 hide	 the	
testimony	of	Allah - if	we	do,	 then	surely	
we	are	of	the	sinners.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	 Imān wālo! Tumhāri	 āpas	 ki	gawāhi	
jab	 tum	 meiñ	 	 kisi	 ko	 mout	 āye	 wasiyat	
karte	 waqt	 tum	 me	 ke	 do	 mo’atabar	
shakhs	 haiñ	 yā	 ghiroñ	 me	 ke do	 jab	 tum	
mulk	me	safar	ko	jāo	phir	tumheñ		mout	kā	
hādsā	 pahuñche	 un	 donoñ	 ko	 Namāz	 ke	
b’ad	roko	woh	Allah	ki	qasam	khayeñ	agar	
tumheñ	 	 kuchh	 shak	 pade	 hum	 halaf	 ke	
badle	 kuchh	 māl	 na	 khareedeñ	 ge	
agarcheh	qareeb	kā	rishtedār	ho	aur	Allah	
ki	gawāhi	 na	 chhupāyeñ	ge	aisa	 kareñ	 to	
hum	zaroor	gunah-gāroñ	meiñ	haiñ	.

arabicText: فَإِنْ عُثِرَ عَلَىٰٓ أَنَّهُمَا ٱسْتَحَقَّآ إِثْمًۭا فَـَٔاخَرَانِ يَقُومَانِ مَقَامَهُمَا مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱسْتَحَقَّ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلْأَوْلَيَـٰنِ فَيُقْسِمَانِ بِٱللَّهِ لَشَهَـٰدَتُنَآ أَحَقُّ مِن شَهَـٰدَتِهِمَا وَمَا ٱعْتَدَيْنَآ إِنَّآ إِذًۭا لَّمِنَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Then	if	it	is	later	known	that	both	of	them	
committed	sin,	two	others	may	take	their	
place,	 from	 those	 who	 were	 caused	 the	
most	harm	by	the	false	testimony,	and	they	
must	swear	by	Allah that,	“Our	testimony	
is	more	accurate	than	the	testimony	of	these	two,	and	we	have	not	exceeded	the	limits	- if	we	do,	
then	surely	we	shall	be	of	the	unjust.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Phir	agar	patā	chale	ke	woh	kisi	gunāh	ke	
sazāwār	huye	to	un	ki	jagah	do	aur	khade	
hoñ	un	me	se	ke	is	gunāh	y’ani	jhooñti	gawāhi	ne	un	kā	haq	le	kar	un	ko	nuqsān	pahuñchāyā	jo	
mayyat	se	ziyādah	qareeb	hoñ	to	Allah	ki	qasam	khayeñ	ke	hamāri	gawāhi	ziyādah	theek	hai	un	
do	ki	gawāhi	se	hum	had	se	na	badhe	aisa	ho	to	hum	zālimoñ	me	hoñ

arabicText: ذَٰلِكَ أَدْنَىٰٓ أَن يَأْتُوا۟ بِٱلشَّهَـٰدَةِ عَلَىٰ وَجْهِهَآ أَوْ يَخَافُوٓا۟ أَن تُرَدَّ أَيْمَـٰنٌۢ بَعْدَ أَيْمَـٰنِهِمْ ۗ وَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَٱسْمَعُوا۟ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يَهْدِى ٱلْقَوْمَ ٱلْفَـٰسِقِينَ
englishTranslationText:
This	is	more	suitable	than	their	bearing	testimony	as	they	wish	or	fear	that	some	oaths	may	be	
made	void,	after	their	taking	oath;	so	fear	Allah and	heed	the	commands;	and	Allah does	not	guide	
the	disobedient.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Yeh	qareeb	tar	hai	is	se	ke	gawāhi	jaisi	chāhiye	adā	kareñ	yā	dareñ	ke	kuchh	qasmieñ	rad	kar	di	
jayeñ	un	ki	qasmoñ	ke	b’ad	aur	Allah	se	daro	aur	hukm	suno	aur	Allah	be-hukmoñ	ko	rāh	nahi	
detā.

arabicText: ۞ يَوْمَ يَجْمَعُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلرُّسُلَ فَيَقُولُ مَاذَآ أُجِبْتُمْ ۖ قَالُوا۟ لَا عِلْمَ لَنَآ ۖ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ عَلَّـٰمُ ٱلْغُيُوبِ
englishTranslationText:
On	 the	day	when	Allah will	gather	all	
the	 Noble	 Messengers,	 and	 then	 say,	
“What	 response	 did	 you	 get?”	 They	
will	 submit,	 “We	 do	 not	 have	 any	
knowledge;	indeed	it	is	only	You,	Who	
knows	all	the	hidden.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Jis	din	Allah	jam'a	farmāyegā	Rasooloñ	ko	
phir	 farmāyegā	 tumheñ kya	 jawāb	 milā	
‘arz	kareñge	hamieñ	luch	Ílm		nahi	be-shak		
tu	hi	hai	sab	ghaiboñ	kā	khoob	jān	ne	wālā

arabicText: إِذْ قَالَ ٱللَّهُ يَـٰعِيسَى ٱبْنَ مَرْيَمَ ٱذْكُرْ نِعْمَتِى عَلَيْكَ وَعَلَىٰ وَٰلِدَتِكَ إِذْ أَيَّدتُّكَ بِرُوحِ ٱلْقُدُسِ تُكَلِّمُ ٱلنَّاسَ فِى ٱلْمَهْدِ وَكَهْلًۭا ۖ وَإِذْ عَلَّمْتُكَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ وَٱلْحِكْمَةَ وَٱلتَّوْرَىٰةَ وَٱلْإِنجِيلَ ۖ وَإِذْ تَخْلُقُ مِنَ ٱلطِّينِ كَهَيْـَٔةِ ٱلطَّيْرِ بِإِذْنِى فَتَنفُخُ فِيهَا فَتَكُونُ طَيْرًۢا بِإِذْنِى ۖ وَتُبْرِئُ ٱلْأَكْمَهَ وَٱلْأَبْرَصَ بِإِذْنِى ۖ وَإِذْ تُخْرِجُ ٱلْمَوْتَىٰ بِإِذْنِى ۖ وَإِذْ كَفَفْتُ بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ عَنكَ إِذْ جِئْتَهُم بِٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتِ فَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِنْهُمْ إِنْ هَـٰذَآ إِلَّا سِحْرٌۭ مُّبِينٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
When	Allah will	say,	“O	Eisa,	the	son	of	
Maryam!	 Remember	 My	 favour	 upon	
you	 and	 your	 mother;	 when	 I	
supported	 you	 with	 the	 Holy	 Spirit;	
you	were	speaking	to	people	from	the	
cradle	 and	 in	 maturity;	 and	 when	 I	
taught	you	 the	Book	and	wisdom	and	
the	 Taurat	 and	 the	 Injeel;	 and	 when	
you	used	to	mould	a	birdlike	sculpture	
from	clay,	by	My	command,	and	blow	
into	it	- so	it	(the	living	bird)	used	to	fly	
by	My	command,	and	you	used	to	cure	
him	who	was	born	blind	and	cure	the	
leper,	by	My	command;	and	when	you	
used	 to	 raise	 up	 the	 dead,	 by	 My	
command;	 and	when	 I	 restrained	 the	
Descendants of	 Israel	 against	 you	
when	 you	 came	 to	 them	 with	 clear	
proofs,	 and	 the	 disbelievers	 among	
them	 said,	 ‘This	 is	 nothing	 but	 clear	
magic’.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Jab	Allah farmāyega	Aey	Mariyam	ke	bete	
Ísā yād	kar	Merā	ahsān	apne	upar	aur	apni	
māñ	 par	 jab	 maiñ	 ne	 pāk	 rooh	 se	 teri	
madad	 ki	 tu	 logoñ	 se	 bātieñ	 kartā	 pālne	
(jhule)	meiñ	aur	pakki	umr	ka	ho	kar	aur	
jab	maiñ	ne	tujhe	sikhāyi	kitāb	aur	hikmat	
aur	 Tourait aur	Injeel aur	 jab	 tu	 mitti	 se	
parind	ki	si	moorat	mere	hukm	se	banātā	
phir	us	meiñ	phoonk	mārtā	 to	woh	mere	
hukm se	udne	lagti	aur	tu	mādar zād	andhe	
aur	 sufaid	 dāgh	 wāle	 ko	 mere	 hukm	 se	
shifā	 detā	 aur	 jab	 tu	 murdoñ	 ko	 mere	
hukm	 se	 zindah	 nikāltā	 aur	 jab	 maiñ	 ne	
Bani	Isrā'il	ko	tujh	se	rokā	jab	tu un	ke	pās	
roshan	nishāniyāñ	le	kar	āya	to	un	meiñ	ke	kāfir	bole	ke	yeh	to	nahiñ	ke	khula	jādu.

arabicText: وَإِذْ أَوْحَيْتُ إِلَى ٱلْحَوَارِيِّـۧنَ أَنْ ءَامِنُوا۟ بِى وَبِرَسُولِى قَالُوٓا۟ ءَامَنَّا وَٱشْهَدْ بِأَنَّنَا مُسْلِمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
“And	when	I	inspired	into	the	hearts	of	
the	disciples	that,	‘Believe	in	Me	and	in	My	Noble	Messenger’;	they	said,	‘We accept	faith,	
and	be	witness	that	we	are	Muslims.’	”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jab	maiñ	ne	hawwāriyoñ	ke	dil	me	dālā	ke	mujh	par	aur	mere	Rasool	par	Imān		lāo	bole	hum	
Imān		lāye	aur	gawāh	rah	ke	hum	Musalmān	haiñ

arabicText: إِذْ قَالَ ٱلْحَوَارِيُّونَ يَـٰعِيسَى ٱبْنَ مَرْيَمَ هَلْ يَسْتَطِيعُ رَبُّكَ أَن يُنَزِّلَ عَلَيْنَا مَآئِدَةًۭ مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ ۖ قَالَ ٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
englishTranslationText:
When	the	disciples	said,	“O	Eisa,	the	son	of	Maryam!	Will	your	Lord	send	down	a	table	
spread	(with	food)	for	us	from	heaven?”	He	said,	“Fear	Allah,	if	you	are	believers.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Jab	hawāriyoñ	ne	kahā	aey	Ísā	Bin	Mariyam kya	Āap	kā	Rab		aisā	karegā	ke	hum	par	āasmān			se	
ek	khwān	utāre	kahā	Allah	se	daro	agar	Imān		rakhte	ho.

arabicText: قَالُوا۟ نُرِيدُ أَن نَّأْكُلَ مِنْهَا وَتَطْمَئِنَّ قُلُوبُنَا وَنَعْلَمَ أَن قَدْ صَدَقْتَنَا وَنَكُونَ عَلَيْهَا مِنَ ٱلشَّـٰهِدِينَ
englishTranslationText:
They	said,	“We	wish	to	eat	from	it	and	so	that	our	hearts	be	convinced	and	to	see	that	
you	have	spoken	the	truth	to	us,	and	that	we	may	be	witnesses	upon	it.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Bole	hum	chāhte	haiñ	ke	us	meiñ	se	khāyeñ	aur	hamāre	dil	thahreñ	aur	hum	āñkhoñ	dekh	leñ	ke	
āp	ne	hum se	sach	farmāyā	aur	hum	us	par	gawāh	ho	jayeñ.

arabicText: قَالَ عِيسَى ٱبْنُ مَرْيَمَ ٱللَّهُمَّ رَبَّنَآ أَنزِلْ عَلَيْنَا مَآئِدَةًۭ مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ تَكُونُ لَنَا عِيدًۭا لِّأَوَّلِنَا وَءَاخِرِنَا وَءَايَةًۭ مِّنكَ ۖ وَٱرْزُقْنَا وَأَنتَ خَيْرُ ٱلرَّٰزِقِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Eisa,	 the	son	of	Maryam,	said,	“O	Allah,	O	
our	Lord!	Send	down	to	us	a	table	spread	
from	heaven,	so	that	it	may	become	a	day	
of	celebration	for	us	– for	our	former	and	
latter	 people	- and	 a	 sign	 from	 You;	 and	
give	us	sustenance	- and	You	are	the	Best	
Provider	Of	Sustenance.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Ísā, Ibn-e-Mariyam ne	arz	ki, Aey	Allah, Aey	
Rab	hamāre!	Hum	par	āasmān	se	ek	khwān	
utār	 ke	 woh	 hamāre	 liye	 Eid	 ho	 hamāre	
agle	 pichhloñ	 ki	 aur	 teri	taraf	 se	 nishāni	
aur	 hamieñ	 rizq	 de	 aur	 tu	 sab	 se	 behtar	
rozi	dene	wālā	hai	.

arabicText: قَالَ عِيسَى ٱبْنُ مَرْيَمَ ٱللَّهُمَّ رَبَّنَآ أَنزِلْ عَلَيْنَا مَآئِدَةًۭ مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ تَكُونُ لَنَا عِيدًۭا لِّأَوَّلِنَا وَءَاخِرِنَا وَءَايَةًۭ مِّنكَ ۖ وَٱرْزُقْنَا وَأَنتَ خَيْرُ ٱلرَّٰزِقِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Said	Allah,	“Indeed	I	shall	send	it	down	to	
you;	 so	 thereafter	 whoever	 disbelieves	
amongst	you	- I	will	surely	mete	out	to	him	
a	 punishment	 with	 which	 I	 shall	 not	
punish	anyone	else	in	the	whole	world.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Allah	 ne	 farmāyā	 ke	 maiñ	 usse	 tum	 par	
utārtā	huñ	phir	ab	jo	tum	me	kufr	karegā	
to	be-shak		maiñ		useyy	woh	‘aƶāb	dungā	
ke	sāre	jahān	meiñ	kisi	par	na	karuñgā

arabicText: وَإِذْ قَالَ ٱللَّهُ يَـٰعِيسَى ٱبْنَ مَرْيَمَ ءَأَنتَ قُلْتَ لِلنَّاسِ ٱتَّخِذُونِى وَأُمِّىَ إِلَـٰهَيْنِ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ ۖ قَالَ سُبْحَـٰنَكَ مَا يَكُونُ لِىٓ أَنْ أَقُولَ مَا لَيْسَ لِى بِحَقٍّ ۚ إِن كُنتُ قُلْتُهُۥ فَقَدْ عَلِمْتَهُۥ ۚ تَعْلَمُ مَا فِى نَفْسِى وَلَآ أَعْلَمُ مَا فِى نَفْسِكَ ۚ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ عَلَّـٰمُ ٱلْغُيُوبِ
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 jab	 Allah	 farmāyegā	 aey	Mariyam	 ke	
bete	Ísā		kya	tu	ne	logoñ	se	kah	diyā	thā	ke	
mujhe	aur	meri	māñ	ko	do	khudā	banā	lo	
Allah	 ke	 siwā	 ‘arz	 karegā	 pāki	 hai	 tujhe	
mujhe	 rawāñ	 nahi	 ke	 woh	 bāt	 kahuñ	 jo	
mujhe	 nahi	 pahuñchti	 agar	 maiñ	 ne	 aisā	
kahā	ho	to	zaroor	tujhe	m’aloom		hogā	tu	
jāntā	hai	jo	mere	jee	me	hai	aur	maiñ	nahi	
jāntā	jo	tere	Ílm		me	hai	be-shak		tu	hi	hai	
sab	ghaiboñ	kā	khoob	jān	ne	wālā

arabicText: مَا قُلْتُ لَهُمْ إِلَّا مَآ أَمَرْتَنِى بِهِۦٓ أَنِ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ رَبِّى وَرَبَّكُمْ ۚ وَكُنتُ عَلَيْهِمْ شَهِيدًۭا مَّا دُمْتُ فِيهِمْ ۖ فَلَمَّا تَوَفَّيْتَنِى كُنتَ أَنتَ ٱلرَّقِيبَ عَلَيْهِمْ ۚ وَأَنتَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ شَهِيدٌ
englishTranslationText:
“I	 have	 not	 told	 them	 except	 what	 You	
commanded	me,	that	‘Worship	Allah,	Who	
is	 my	 Lord	 and	 is	 also	 your	 Lord’;	 I	 was	
aware	of	them	till	I	was	among	them;	and	
when	 You	 raised	 me,	 only	 You	 watched	
over	 them;	 and	 all	 things	 are	 present	
before	You.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Maiñ	 ne	 to	 un	 se	 na	 kahā	magar	 wohi	jo	
mujhe	 tu	 ne	 hukm	 diyā	 thā	 ke	 Allah	 ko	
poojo	jo	merā	bhi	Rab aur	tumhāra	bhi	Rab		
aur	maiñ	un	par	muttl'a	 thā	jab	 tak	maiñ		
un	mein	rahā	phir	jab	tu	ne	mujhe	uthā	liyā	
to	 tu	 hi	 un	 par	 nigāh	 rakhta	 thā	 aur	 har	
cheez	tere	sāmne	hāzir	hai

arabicText: إِن تُعَذِّبْهُمْ فَإِنَّهُمْ عِبَادُكَ ۖ وَإِن تَغْفِرْ لَهُمْ فَإِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْحَكِيمُ
englishTranslationText:
“If	you	punish	them,	then	indeed	they	are	
Your	slaves;	and	if	you	forgive	them,	then	indeed	You	only	are	the	Almighty,	the	Wise.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Agar	 tu	 unhieñ aƶāb	 kare	 to	 woh	 tere	
bande	haiñ	aur	agar	tu	unhieñ	bakhash	de	
to	be-shak		tu	hi	hai	ghālib	hikmat	wālā	.

arabicText: قَالَ ٱللَّهُ هَـٰذَا يَوْمُ يَنفَعُ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ صِدْقُهُمْ ۚ لَهُمْ جَنَّـٰتٌۭ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدًۭا ۚ رَّضِىَ ٱللَّهُ عَنْهُمْ وَرَضُوا۟ عَنْهُ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْعَظِيمُ
englishTranslationText:
Proclaimed	Allah,	“This	is	a	day	on	which	 the	 truthful will	benefit	 from	 their	 truthfulness;	 for	
them	are	Gardens	beneath	which	rivers	flow,	in	which	they	will	abide	for	ever	and	ever;	Allah is	
pleased	with	them	and	they	are	pleased	with	Allah;	this	is	the	greatest	success.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Allah	ne	farmāyā	ke	yeh	hai	woh	din	jis	meiñ	sachchoñ	ko	un	kā	sach	kām	āayegā	un	ke	liye	bāgh	
haiñ	jin	ke	neecheiñ	nahraieñ	rawrañ	hameshā	hameshā	un	meiñ	raheñge	Allah	un	se	rāzi	aur	
woh	Allah	se	rāzi	yeh	hai	badi	kāmyābi

arabicText: لِلَّهِ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا فِيهِنَّ ۚ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ قَدِيرٌۢ
englishTranslationText:
To	Allah only	belongs	the	kingship	of	the	heavens	and	the	earth	and	all	that	is	in	them:	and	He	is	
Able	to	do	all	things.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Allah	hi	ke	liye	hai	āasmānoñ	aur	zameen	aur	jo	kuchh	in	meiñ	hai	sab	ki	saltanat	aur	woh	har	
cheez	par	qādir	hai

arabicText: ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَجَعَلَ ٱلظُّلُمَـٰتِ وَٱلنُّورَ ۖ ثُمَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِرَبِّهِمْ يَعْدِلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
All	praise	is	to	Allah,	Who has	created	the	
heavens	 and	 the	 earth,	 and	 has	 created	
darkness	 and	 light;	 yet	 the	 disbelievers	
appoint	equals	(false	deities)	to	their	Lord!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Sab	khoobiyāñ Allah	ko	jis	ne	āasmān aur	
zameen	 banāye	 aur	 andheriyañ	 aur	
raushani	paidā	ki	is	par	kāfir	log	apne	Rab	
ke	barābar	thahrāte	haiñ	.

arabicText: هُوَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَكُم مِّن طِينٍۢ ثُمَّ قَضَىٰٓ أَجَلًۭا ۖ وَأَجَلٌۭ مُّسَمًّى عِندَهُۥ ۖ ثُمَّ أَنتُمْ تَمْتَرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
It	is	He	Who	has	created	you	from	clay,	and	
then	 decreed	 a	 term	 for	 you;	 and	 it	 is	 a	
fixed	 promise	 before	 Him,	 yet	 you	 still	
doubt!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Wohi	hai	jis	ne	tumheñ		mitti	se	paidā	kiyā	
phir	 ek	 mi'ād	 ka	 hukm	 rakhā	 aur	 ek	
muqarrarah	 w'ādā us	 ke	 yahāñ	 hai	 phir	
tum	log	shak	karte	ho

arabicText: وَهُوَ ٱللَّهُ فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَفِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ يَعْلَمُ سِرَّكُمْ وَجَهْرَكُمْ وَيَعْلَمُ مَا تَكْسِبُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	He	is	Allah (the	 God)	of	 the	 heavens	
and	in	the	earth;	He	knows	all,	your	secrets	
and	your	disclosures,	and	He	knows	your	
deeds.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	wohi	Allah	hai	āasmānoñ	aur	zameen	
kā	 useyy tumhārā	 chhupā	 aur	 zāhir	 sab	
m’āloom hai	aur	tumhāre	kām	jāntā	hai	.

arabicText: وَمَا تَأْتِيهِم مِّنْ ءَايَةٍۢ مِّنْ ءَايَـٰتِ رَبِّهِمْ إِلَّا كَانُوا۟ عَنْهَا مُعْرِضِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	never	does	a	sign	come	to	them	from	
among	the	signs	of	Allah,	except	that	they	
*	turn	away	from	it.	(*	The	disbelievers)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	un	ke	pās	koi	bhi	nishāni	un	ke	Rab	ki	
nishāniyoñ	se	nahi	āati	magar	us se	muñh		
pher	lete	haiñ	.

arabicText: فَقَدْ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِٱلْحَقِّ لَمَّا جَآءَهُمْ ۖ فَسَوْفَ يَأْتِيهِمْ أَنۢبَـٰٓؤُا۟ مَا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ
englishTranslationText:
So	indeed they	denied	the	truth	*	when	it	
came	 to	 them;	 so	 now	 the	 tidings	 of	 the	
thing	 they	 used	 to	 mock	 at,	 will	 come	 to	
them.	
(*Prophet Muhammad -peace and 
blessings be upon him, or the Holy Qur’an).
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	be-shak	unhoñ	ne	haq	ko	jhutlāyā	jab	un	
ke	pās	āyā		to	ab	unhieñ	khabar	huā	chāhti	
hai	us	cheez	ki	jis	par	hañs	rahe	the	.

arabicText: أَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ كَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا مِن قَبْلِهِم مِّن قَرْنٍۢ مَّكَّنَّـٰهُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ مَا لَمْ نُمَكِّن لَّكُمْ وَأَرْسَلْنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ عَلَيْهِم مِّدْرَارًۭا وَجَعَلْنَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرَ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهِمْ فَأَهْلَكْنَـٰهُم بِذُنُوبِهِمْ وَأَنشَأْنَا مِنۢ بَعْدِهِمْ قَرْنًا ءَاخَرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Do	they	not	see	how	many	civilisations	We	
destroyed	 before	 them,	 whom	 We	 had	
established	 more	 firmly	 in	 the	 earth	 than	 We	 have	 established	 you,	 and	 We	 sent	 on	 them	
abundant	 rain	 from	 the	 sky,	 and	made	 the	 rivers	 flow	 beneath	 them?	 So	we	 destroyed	 them	
because	of	their	sins,	and	created	another	civilisation	after	them.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kya	unhoñ	ne	na	dekhā	 ke	hum	ne	un	 se	
pahle	 kitni	 sangtieñ (qaumieñ)	 khapā	 diñ	
unhieñ	hum	ne	zameen	me	woh	jamao	diyā	jo	tum	ko	na	diyā	aur		un	par	mōslādhār	pāni	bhejā	
aur	un	ke	neeche	naharieñ	bahāyiñ	to	unhieñ	hum	ne	un	ke	gunhāhoñ	ke	sabab	halāk	kiyā	aur	un	
ke	b’ad		aur	sangat	uthāyi	.

arabicText: وَلَوْ نَزَّلْنَا عَلَيْكَ كِتَـٰبًۭا فِى قِرْطَاسٍۢ فَلَمَسُوهُ بِأَيْدِيهِمْ لَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ إِنْ هَـٰذَآ إِلَّا سِحْرٌۭ مُّبِينٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
And	had	We	sent	down	to	you	(O	dear	Prophet	Muhammad - peace	and	blessings	be	upon	him)	
something	written	on	paper	so	that	they	could	feel	it	with	their	hands,	even	then	the	disbelievers	
would	have	said,	“This	is	nothing	but	clear	magic.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	agar	hum	tum	par	kāgahz	meiñ	kuchh	likhā	huā	utārte	ke		woh	usey	apne	hāthoñ	se	chhoote	
jab	bhi	kāfir	kahte	ke	yeh	nahi	magar	khulā	jādu

arabicText: وَقَالُوا۟ لَوْلَآ أُنزِلَ عَلَيْهِ مَلَكٌۭ ۖ وَلَوْ أَنزَلْنَا مَلَكًۭا لَّقُضِىَ ٱلْأَمْرُ ثُمَّ لَا يُنظَرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	they	said,	“Why	has	not	an	angel	been	sent	down	to	him?”	And	had	We	sent	down	an	angel,	
then	the	matter	would	have	been	finished,	and	they	would	not	get	any	respite.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	bole	in	par	koi	Firishtā	kyuñ	na	utārā	gayā	aur	agar	hum	Firiahtā	utārte	to	kām	tamām	ho	
gayā	hotā	phir	unhieñ	mohalat	na	di	jāti

arabicText: وَلَوْ جَعَلْنَـٰهُ مَلَكًۭا لَّجَعَلْنَـٰهُ رَجُلًۭا وَلَلَبَسْنَا عَلَيْهِم مَّا يَلْبِسُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 had	 we	 appointed	 an	 angel	 as	 a	
Prophet,	We	would	still	have	made	him	as	
a	man	and	would	 keep	 them	in	 the	same	
doubt,	as	they	are	now	in.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 agar	 hum	Nabi	 ko	 Farishtā	 karte	jab	
bhi	usey	mard	hi	banāte	aur	un par	wohi	
shubah	rakhte	jis	meiñ	ab pade	haiñ	.

arabicText: وَلَقَدِ ٱسْتُهْزِئَ بِرُسُلٍۢ مِّن قَبْلِكَ فَحَاقَ بِٱلَّذِينَ سَخِرُوا۟ مِنْهُم مَّا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	certainly,	O	dear	Prophet	(Muhammad
- peace	 and	 blessings	 be	 upon	 him)	 the	
Noble	 Messengers	 before	 you	 have	 also	
been	mocked	at,	so	those	who	laughed	at	
them	 were	 themselves	 ruined	 by	 their	
own	mocking.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	zaroor	aey	Mehaboob!	Tum	 se	pahle		
Rasooloñ	 ke	 sāth	 bhi	 thathā	 kiyā	 gayā	 to	
woh	jo	un	se	hanste	the	un	ki	hansi	unhiñ	
ko	le	baithi.

arabicText: قُلْ سِيرُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ثُمَّ ٱنظُرُوا۟ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَـٰقِبَةُ ٱلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Proclaim,	“Travel	in	the	land,	and	see	what	
sort	of	fate	befell	those	who	denied.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	 farmā	do	zameen	me	sair	karo	phir	
dekho	ke	jhutlaāne	wāloñ	kā	kaisa anjām	
huā

arabicText: قُل لِّمَن مَّا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ قُل لِّلَّهِ ۚ كَتَبَ عَلَىٰ نَفْسِهِ ٱلرَّحْمَةَ ۚ لَيَجْمَعَنَّكُمْ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ لَا رَيْبَ فِيهِ ۚ ٱلَّذِينَ خَسِرُوٓا۟ أَنفُسَهُمْ فَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Say,	“To	Whom	does	all	whatever	is	in	the	
heavens	and	the	earth,	belong?”	Proclaim,	
“To	Allah”;	He	has	prescribed	mercy	upon	
His	 grace;	 undoubtedly,	 He	 will	 surely	
gather	 you	 all	 together	 on	 the	 Day	 of	
Resurrection	in	 which	 there	is	 no	 doubt;	
those	who	 put	 their	 souls	 to	 ruin,	 do	 not	
accept	faith
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	farmāo	kis	kā	hai	jo	kuchh	āasmanoñ		
aur	zameen	me	tum	farmāo	Allah	kā	hai	us	
ne	apne	karam	ke	zimme	par	rahmat	likh	li	
hai	 be-shak	 	 zaroor	 tumheñ	 	 qayāmat	 ke	
din	 jam'a	 karegā	 is	 me	 kuchh	 shak	 nahi	
woh	 jinhoñ	 ne	 apni	 jān	 nuqsān	 me	 dāli	
Imān		nahi	lāte.

arabicText: ۞ وَلَهُۥ مَا سَكَنَ فِى ٱلَّيْلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِ ۚ وَهُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ
englishTranslationText:
And	 to	 Him	 only	 belongs	 all	 whatever	
exists	in	the	night	and	in	the	day;	and	He	
only	is	the	All	Hearing,	the	All	Knowing.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	usi	kā	hai	jo	kuchh	bastā	hai	rāt	aur	
din	me	aur	wohi	hai	suntā	jāntā	.

arabicText: قُلْ أَغَيْرَ ٱللَّهِ أَتَّخِذُ وَلِيًّۭا فَاطِرِ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَهُوَ يُطْعِمُ وَلَا يُطْعَمُ ۗ قُلْ إِنِّىٓ أُمِرْتُ أَنْ أَكُونَ أَوَّلَ مَنْ أَسْلَمَ ۖ وَلَا تَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Say,	 “Shall	 I	 choose	 as	 a	 supporter	
someone	 other	 than	 Allah,	 Who	 is	 the	
Originator	 of	 the	 heavens	 and	 the	 earth	
and	Who	feeds	and	does	not	need	to	eat?”	
Say,	“I	have	been	ordered	to	be	the	first	to	submit	myself	(to	Him),	and	O	people,	do	not	be	of	the	
polytheists.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	farmāo	kya	Allah	ke	siwā	kisi	aur	ko	
wāli	 banāuñ	 woh	 Allah	 jis	 ne	 āasmān	 	 o	
zameen	paidā	kiye	aur	woh	khilātā	hai	aur	
woh	khāne	se	pāk	hai	 tum	 farmāo	mujhe	
hukm	huā	hai	ke	sab	se	pahle		gardan	rakhuñ	aur	hargiz	shirk	wāloñ	me	na	honā.aur	
din	me	aur	wohi	hai	suntā	jāntā	.

arabicText: قُلْ إِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ إِنْ عَصَيْتُ رَبِّى عَذَابَ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍۢ
englishTranslationText: Say,	“If	I	disobey	my	Lord,	I	then	fear	the	punishment	of	the	Great	Day	(of	Resurrection).”
romanUrduTranslationText: Tum	farmāo	agar	maiñ		apne	Rab	ki	nā-farmāni	karuñ	to	mujhe	bade	din	ke	‘aƶāb	kā	darr	hai

arabicText: مَّن يُصْرَفْ عَنْهُ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ فَقَدْ رَحِمَهُۥ ۚ وَذَٰلِكَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْمُبِينُ
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	Allah’s	mercy	has	been	upon	him,	from	whom	the	punishment	has	been	averted	on	that	
Day;	and	this	is	the	clear	success
romanUrduTranslationText:
Us	 din	 jis	 se	 ‘aƶāb	 pher	 diyā	 jāye	 zaroor	 us	 par	Allah	 ki	mehar	 (Rehmat)	 hui	 aur	 yahi	 khuli	
kāmyābi	hai	.

arabicText: وَإِن يَمْسَسْكَ ٱللَّهُ بِضُرٍّۢ فَلَا كَاشِفَ لَهُۥٓ إِلَّا هُوَ ۖ وَإِن يَمْسَسْكَ بِخَيْرٍۢ فَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ قَدِيرٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
And	if	Allah afflicts	you	with	some	misfortune,	then	there	is	none	who	can	remove	it,	except	Him;	
and	if	He	sends	you	some	good	fortune,	then	(know	that)	He	is	Able	to	do	all	things
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	agar	tujhe	Allah	koi	burāyi	pahuñchāye	to	us	ke	siwā	us	ko	koi	door	karne	wālā	nahi	aur	agar	
tujhe	bhalāyi	pahuñchāye	to	woh	sab	kuchh	kar	saktā	hai	.

arabicText: وَهُوَ ٱلْقَاهِرُ فَوْقَ عِبَادِهِۦ ۚ وَهُوَ ٱلْحَكِيمُ ٱلْخَبِيرُ
englishTranslationText: He	is	the	Omnipotent	over	His	bondmen;	and	He	is	the	Wise,	the	Aware
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	wohi	ghālib	hai	apne	bandoñ	par	aur	wohi	hai	hikmat	wālā	khabardār

arabicText: قُلْ أَىُّ شَىْءٍ أَكْبَرُ شَهَـٰدَةًۭ ۖ قُلِ ٱللَّهُ ۖ شَهِيدٌۢ بَيْنِى وَبَيْنَكُمْ ۚ وَأُوحِىَ إِلَىَّ هَـٰذَا ٱلْقُرْءَانُ لِأُنذِرَكُم بِهِۦ وَمَنۢ بَلَغَ ۚ أَئِنَّكُمْ لَتَشْهَدُونَ أَنَّ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ ءَالِهَةً أُخْرَىٰ ۚ قُل لَّآ أَشْهَدُ ۚ قُلْ إِنَّمَا هُوَ إِلَـٰهٌۭ وَٰحِدٌۭ وَإِنَّنِى بَرِىٓءٌۭ مِّمَّا تُشْرِكُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Proclaim	 (O	 dear	 Prophet	 Muhammad -
peace	and	blessings	be	upon	him),	“Whose	
testimony	is	the	greatest?”	Say,	“Allah is	the	
Witness	 between	 me	 and	 you;	 and	 this	
Qur’an	 has	 been	 sent	 down	 upon	me,	 so	 I	
may	warn	you	with	it	and	whomever	it	may	
reach;	so	do	you	bear	witness	that	there	are	
other	Gods	along	with	Allah?”	Say,	“I	do	not	
bear	witness	to	it”;	Say,	“He	is	the	only	One	
God	 and	 I	 do	 not	 have	 any	 relation	 with	
whatever	you	ascribe	as	partners	(to	Him).”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Farmāo	 sab	 se	 badi	 gawāhi	 kis	 ki	 tum	
farmāo	ke	Allah	gawāh	hai	mujh	meiñ	aur	
tum	meiñ	aur meri	taraf	is	Qur'an	ki	waḥi	
huyi	hai	ke	maiñ	is	se	tumheñ		darāuñ	aur	
jin	jin	ko	pahuñche	to	kya	tum	yeh	gawāhi	
dete	ho	ke	Allah	ke	sāth	aur	khudā	hai	tum	
farmāo	ke	maiñ	yeh	gawāhi	nahi	detā	tum	
farmāo	 ke	 woh	 to	 ek	 hi	 m'abood	 hai	 aur	
maiñ	bezār	huñ	un	se jin	ko	 tum	shareek	
thahrāte	ho.

arabicText: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَاتَيْنَـٰهُمُ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ يَعْرِفُونَهُۥ كَمَا يَعْرِفُونَ أَبْنَآءَهُمُ ۘ ٱلَّذِينَ خَسِرُوٓا۟ أَنفُسَهُمْ فَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
englishTranslationText:
The	people	to	whom	We	gave	the	Book(s)	
recognise	 this	 Prophet	 (Muhammad -
peace	 and	 blessings	 be	 upon	 him)	 as	 they	
recognise	 their	 own	 sons;	 those	 who	 put	
their	own	souls	to	ruin,	do	not	accept	faith
romanUrduTranslationText:
Jin	 ko	 Hum	 ne	 Kitāb	 di	 us	 Nabi	 ko	
pehchānte	 hai	 jaisā	 apne	 betoñ	 ko	
pehchānte	haiñ	jinhoñ	ne	apni	jān	nuqsān	
meiñ	dāli	woh	Imān		nahi	lāte	.

arabicText: وَمَنْ أَظْلَمُ مِمَّنِ ٱفْتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا أَوْ كَذَّبَ بِـَٔايَـٰتِهِۦٓ ۗ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُفْلِحُ ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 who	 is	 more	 unjust	 than	 one	 who	
fabricates	lies	against	Allah or	denies	His	
signs?	Undoubtedly,	 the	unjust	will	never	
succeed.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	us	se	badh	kar	zālim	kaun		jo	Allah	par	
jhoot	bāñdhe	yā	us	ki	āayatieñ	jhutlāye	beshak		zālim	falāh	na	pāyeñ

arabicText: وَيَوْمَ نَحْشُرُهُمْ جَمِيعًۭا ثُمَّ نَقُولُ لِلَّذِينَ أَشْرَكُوٓا۟ أَيْنَ شُرَكَآؤُكُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ كُنتُمْ تَزْعُمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 on	 the	 day	 when	 We	 will	 resurrect	
everyone	 together,	 then	 say	 to	 the	
polytheists,	 “Where	 are	 those	 partners	
(your	false	deities)	whom	you	professed?”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 jis	 din	 hum	 sab	 ko	 uthāyeñge	 phir	
mushrikoñ	se	farmāyeñge	kahañ	haiñ	woh	
tumhāre	 shareek	 jin	 kā	 tum	 d’awā karte	
the

arabicText: ثُمَّ لَمْ تَكُن فِتْنَتُهُمْ إِلَّآ أَن قَالُوا۟ وَٱللَّهِ رَبِّنَا مَا كُنَّا مُشْرِكِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Then	 they	 had	 no	 fabrication	 except	 that	
they	 said,	 “By	 Allah,	 our	 Lord,	 we	 were	
never	polytheists!”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Phir	 un	 ki	 kuchh	 banāwat	 na	 rahi	 magar	
yeh	 ke	 bole	 hamieñ	 apne	 Rab	 Allah	 ki	
qasam	ke	hum	mushrik	na	the

arabicText: ٱنظُرْ كَيْفَ كَذَبُوا۟ عَلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِهِمْ ۚ وَضَلَّ عَنْهُم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يَفْتَرُونَ
englishTranslationText: Observe	how	they	lied	against	themselves,	and	how	they	lost	the	things	they	fabricated!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Dekho	kaisā	jhoot	bāñdhā	khud	apne	upar	
aur	gum	gayiñ	un	se	jo	bātieñ	banāte	the	.

arabicText: ٱنظُرْ كَيْفَ كَذَبُوا۟ عَلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِهِمْ ۚ وَضَلَّ عَنْهُم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يَفْتَرُونَ
englishTranslationText: Observe	how	they	lied	against	themselves,	and	how	they	lost	the	things	they	fabricated!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Dekho	kaisā	jhoot	bāñdhā	khud	apne	upar	
aur	gum	gayiñ	un	se	jo	bātieñ	banāte	the	.

arabicText: وَمِنْهُم مَّن يَسْتَمِعُ إِلَيْكَ ۖ وَجَعَلْنَا عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمْ أَكِنَّةً أَن يَفْقَهُوهُ وَفِىٓ ءَاذَانِهِمْ وَقْرًۭا ۚ وَإِن يَرَوْا۟ كُلَّ ءَايَةٍۢ لَّا يُؤْمِنُوا۟ بِهَا ۚ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءُوكَ يُجَـٰدِلُونَكَ يَقُولُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ إِنْ هَـٰذَآ إِلَّآ أَسَـٰطِيرُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	among	them	is	one	who	listens	to	you;	and	We	have	put	covers	upon	their	hearts	so	they	
may	not	understand	it,	and	deafness	in	their	ears;	and	(even)	if	they	see	all	the	signs,	they	will	not	
believe	in	them;	to	the	extent	that	when	they	come	to	you	to	debate	with	you,	the	disbelievers	
say,	“This	is	nothing	but	stories	of	former	people.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	un	me	koi	woh	hai	jo	tumhāri	taraf	kān	
lagātā	hai	aur	hum	ne	un	ke	diloñ	par	ghilāf	kar	diye	haiñ	ke	useyy	na	samjheñ	aur	un	ke	kānoñ	
me	tent	(thoonsi	hui	ruyi)	aur	agar	sāri	nishāniyañ	dekheñ	to	un	par	Imān		na	lāyeñge	yahāñ	tak	
ke	 jab	 tumhāre	 Huzur	 tum	 se	 jhagadte	 hāzir	 hoñ	 to	 kāfir	 kaheñ	 yeh	 to	 nahi	 magar	 agloñ	 ki	
dāstānieñ.

arabicText: وَهُمْ يَنْهَوْنَ عَنْهُ وَيَنْـَٔوْنَ عَنْهُ ۖ وَإِن يُهْلِكُونَ إِلَّآ أَنفُسَهُمْ وَمَا يَشْعُرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	they	stop	(others)	from	it	and	run	away	from	it;	and	they	ruin	none	except	themselves,	and	
they	do	not	have	sense.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	woh	us	se	rokte	aur	us	se	door	bhāgte	haiñ	aur	halāk	nahi	karte	magar	apni	jānieñ	aur	unheñ	
sha'oor	nahi

arabicText: وَلَوْ تَرَىٰٓ إِذْ وُقِفُوا۟ عَلَى ٱلنَّارِ فَقَالُوا۟ يَـٰلَيْتَنَا نُرَدُّ وَلَا نُكَذِّبَ بِـَٔايَـٰتِ رَبِّنَا وَنَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	if	you	see	them	when	they	will	be	placed	above	hell,	they	will	say,	“Alas,	if	only	we	might	be	
sent	back	and	not	deny	the	signs	of	our	Lord,	and	become	Muslims!”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	kabhi	tum	dekho	jab	woh	āag	par	khade	kiye	jāyeñge	to	kaheñge	kāsh	kisi	tarah	hum	wāpis	
bheje	jāyeñ	aur	apne	Rab	ki	Āyatieñ	na	jhutlāyeñ	aur	Musalmān	ho	jayeñ

arabicText: بَلْ بَدَا لَهُم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يُخْفُونَ مِن قَبْلُ ۖ وَلَوْ رُدُّوا۟ لَعَادُوا۟ لِمَا نُهُوا۟ عَنْهُ وَإِنَّهُمْ لَكَـٰذِبُونَ
englishTranslationText:
In	 fact	it	 has	 become	 clear	 to	 them	what	
they	used	to	hide	before;	and	were	they	to	
be	sent	back,	they	would	commit	the	same	
which	 they	 were	 forbidden	 to,	 and	
undoubtedly	they	are	liars.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Balke	un	par	khul	gayā	jo	pahle	chhupāte	
the	 aur	 agar	 wāpas	 bheje	 jāyeñ	 to	 phir	
wohi	kareñge	jis	se	man'a	kiye	gaye	the	aur	
be-shak		woh	zaroor	jhute	haiñ	.

arabicText: وَقَالُوٓا۟ إِنْ هِىَ إِلَّا حَيَاتُنَا ٱلدُّنْيَا وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمَبْعُوثِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 they	 said,	 “There	 is	 no	 other	 life	
except	our	life	of	this	world,	and	we	are	not	
to	be	raised.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 bole	 woh	 to	 yahi	 hamāri	 duniyā	 ki	
zindagi	hai	aur	hamieñ	uthhnā	nahi

arabicText: وَلَوْ تَرَىٰٓ إِذْ وُقِفُوا۟ عَلَىٰ رَبِّهِمْ ۚ قَالَ أَلَيْسَ هَـٰذَا بِٱلْحَقِّ ۚ قَالُوا۟ بَلَىٰ وَرَبِّنَا ۚ قَالَ فَذُوقُوا۟ ٱلْعَذَابَ بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَكْفُرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	if	you	see	when	they	are	placed	before	
their	Lord,	He	will	say,	“Is	this	not	real	(the	
truth)?	They	will	say,	“Yes	- why	not,	by	our	
Lord!”	 He	 will	 say,	 “So	 now	 taste	 the	
punishment	 - the	 recompense	 of	 your	
disbelief.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 kabhi	 tum	 dekho	 jab	 apne	 Rab	 ke	
huzoor	khade	kiye	jāyeñge	farmāyegā	kyā	
yeh	 haq	 nahi	 hai	 kaheñge	 kyuñ	 nahi	
hameiñ	 apne	 Rab	 ki	 qasam	 farmāyegā	 to	
ab	‘aƶāb	chakho	apne	kufar	kā

arabicText: قَدْ خَسِرَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِلِقَآءِ ٱللَّهِ ۖ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءَتْهُمُ ٱلسَّاعَةُ بَغْتَةًۭ قَالُوا۟ يَـٰحَسْرَتَنَا عَلَىٰ مَا فَرَّطْنَا فِيهَا وَهُمْ يَحْمِلُونَ أَوْزَارَهُمْ عَلَىٰ ظُهُورِهِمْ ۚ أَلَا سَآءَ مَا يَزِرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Those	 who	 denied	 their	 meeting	 with	
Allah,	have	indeed	failed;	to	the	extent	that	
when	 the	 Last	 Day	 suddenly	 came	 upon	
them	they	said,	“Woe	to	us	that	we	 failed	
to	 believe	 in	 it”	 - and	 they	 carry	 their	
burdens	 on	 their	 backs;	 what	 an	 evil	
burden	they	carry!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be-shak	 	 hār	 meiñ	 rahe	 woh	 jinhoñ	 ne	
apne	Rab	se	milne	kā	inkār	kiyā	yahāñ	tak	
ke	jab	un	par	qayāmat	achānak	āa	gayi	bole	
hāye	afsos	 hamārā	is	 par	 ke	is	 ke	mānne	
meiñ	 taqseer	 ki	 aur	 woh	 apne	 bojh	 apni	
peeth	par	lāde	huye	haiñ	Arey	kitna	burā	
bojh	uthāye	haiñ

arabicText: وَمَا ٱلْحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنْيَآ إِلَّا لَعِبٌۭ وَلَهْوٌۭ ۖ وَلَلدَّارُ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةُ خَيْرٌۭ لِّلَّذِينَ يَتَّقُونَ ۗ أَفَلَا تَعْقِلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
The	life	 of	 this	world	is	 nothing	 except	 a	
pastime	 and	 sport;	 and	 undoubtedly	 the	
abode	 of	 the	 Hereafter	 is	 better	 for	 the	
pious;	so	do	you	not	have	sense?
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 duniyā	 ki	 zindagi	 nahi	 magar	 khel	
kood	aur	be-shak		pichhlā	ghar	bhalā	un	ke	
liye	jo	 darte	 haiñ	 to	 kyā	 tumheñ	 	 samajh	
nahi.

arabicText: قَدْ نَعْلَمُ إِنَّهُۥ لَيَحْزُنُكَ ٱلَّذِى يَقُولُونَ ۖ فَإِنَّهُمْ لَا يُكَذِّبُونَكَ وَلَـٰكِنَّ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ بِـَٔايَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ يَجْحَدُونَ
englishTranslationText:
We	know	well	that	their	statement	grieves	
you	 - so	 they	 do	 not	 deny	 you	 (Prophet	
Muhammad - peace	and	blessings	be	upon	
him)	but	in	fact	the	unjust	deny	the	signs	of	Allah.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Hamieñ	m'aloom	hai	ke	tumheñ		ranj	deti	
hai	woh	 bāt	jo	 yeh	 kah	 rahe	 haiñ	 to	woh	
tumheñ		nahi	jhutlāte	balke	zālim	Allah	ki	āayatoñ	se	inkār	karte	haiñ

arabicText: وَلَقَدْ كُذِّبَتْ رُسُلٌۭ مِّن قَبْلِكَ فَصَبَرُوا۟ عَلَىٰ مَا كُذِّبُوا۟ وَأُوذُوا۟ حَتَّىٰٓ أَتَىٰهُمْ نَصْرُنَا ۚ وَلَا مُبَدِّلَ لِكَلِمَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ وَلَقَدْ جَآءَكَ مِن نَّبَإِى۟ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	indeed	Noble	Messengers	have	been	denied	before you,	so	they	patiently	bore	the	denial	and	
torture	till	Our	help	reached	them;	and	there	is	none	to	alter	the	decisions	of	Allah;	and	the	news	
of	the	Noble	Messengers	have	already	reached	you.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 tum	se	pahle	Rsool		jhutlāye	gaye	 to	unhoñ	ne	sabar	kiyā	us	jhtlāne	aur	izāyieñ	pāne	par	
yahāñ	tak	ke	unheñ	hamāri	madad	āayi	aur	Allah	ki	bātien	badalne	wālā	koi	nahi	aur	tumhāre	
pās	Rasooloñ	ki	khabrieñ	āa hi	chukiñ	haiñ	.

arabicText: وَإِن كَانَ كَبُرَ عَلَيْكَ إِعْرَاضُهُمْ فَإِنِ ٱسْتَطَعْتَ أَن تَبْتَغِىَ نَفَقًۭا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ أَوْ سُلَّمًۭا فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَتَأْتِيَهُم بِـَٔايَةٍۢ ۚ وَلَوْ شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ لَجَمَعَهُمْ عَلَى ٱلْهُدَىٰ ۚ فَلَا تَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلْجَـٰهِلِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	if	their	turning	away	has	grieved	you,	then	if	you	can,	seek	a	tunnel	into	the	earth	or	a	ladder	
into	the	sky	to	bring	a	sign	for	them;	and	if	Allah willed,	He	could	have	brought	them	all	together	
upon	guidance,	so	O	listener	(followers	of	this	Prophet)	do	not	ever	be	of	the	ignorant
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	agar	un	kā	muñh		phernā	tum	par	shāq	guzārā	hai	to agar	tum	se	ho	sake	to	zameen	me	koi	
surang	talāsh	kar	lo	yā	āasmān	me	zeenah	phir	un	ke	liye	nishāni	le	āao		aur	Allah	chāhtā	to	unheñ	
hidāyat	par	ikhattā	kar	detā	to	aey	sun'ne	wāle!	Tu	hargiz	nādān	na	ban.

arabicText: ۞ إِنَّمَا يَسْتَجِيبُ ٱلَّذِينَ يَسْمَعُونَ ۘ وَٱلْمَوْتَىٰ يَبْعَثُهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ثُمَّ إِلَيْهِ يُرْجَعُونَ
englishTranslationText:
It	 is	 only	 those	 who	 hear	 (with	 sincere	
hearts)	 that	 accept	 faith;	 and	 Allah will	
raise	 these	 people	 dead	 of	 heart,	 then	
towards	Him	they	will	be	herded.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Mānte	 to	 wohi	 haiñ	jo	 sunte	 haiñ	 aur	 un	
murdā	diloñ	ko	Allah	uthāyegā	phir	us	ki	
taraf	hāñke	jāyeñge

arabicText: وَقَالُوا۟ لَوْلَا نُزِّلَ عَلَيْهِ ءَايَةٌۭ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦ ۚ قُلْ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ قَادِرٌ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يُنَزِّلَ ءَايَةًۭ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	they	said,	“Why	has	no	sign	been	sent	
down	 upon	 him	 from	 his	 Lord?”	 Say,	
“Indeed	Allah is	Able	to	send	down	a	sign”,	
but	most	of	them	are	totally	ignorant.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	bole	un	par	koi	nishāni	kyuñ	na	utri	un	
ke	 Rab	 ki	 taraf	 se	 tum	 farmāo	 ke	 Allah	
qādir	hai	ke	koi	nishāni	utāre	lekin	un	me	
bahut	nire	jāhil	haiñ

arabicText: وَمَا مِن دَآبَّةٍۢ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَا طَـٰٓئِرٍۢ يَطِيرُ بِجَنَاحَيْهِ إِلَّآ أُمَمٌ أَمْثَالُكُم ۚ مَّا فَرَّطْنَا فِى ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ مِن شَىْءٍۢ ۚ ثُمَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمْ يُحْشَرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 there	is	not an	animal	moving	in	 the	
earth	 nor	 a	 bird	 flying	 on	 its	 wings,	 but	
they	are	a	nation	like	you;	We	have	left	out	
nothing	in	 this	Book	- then	 towards	 their	
Lord	they	will	be	raised
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	nahi	 koi	zameen	me	chalne	wālā	aur	
na	 koi	 parind	 ke	 apne	 paroñ	 udtā	 hai	
magar	tum	jaisi	ummatieñ	hum	ne	is	kitāb	
me	kuchh	uthā	na	rakhā	phir	apne	Rab	ki	
taraf	uthāye	jāyeñge

arabicText: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا صُمٌّۭ وَبُكْمٌۭ فِى ٱلظُّلُمَـٰتِ ۗ مَن يَشَإِ ٱللَّهُ يُضْلِلْهُ وَمَن يَشَأْ يَجْعَلْهُ عَلَىٰ صِرَٰطٍۢ مُّسْتَقِيمٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
And	those	who	deny	Our	signs	are	deaf	and	
dumb	 in	 realms	 of	 darkness;	 Allah may	
send	astray	whomever	He	wills;	and	may	
place	 on	 the	 Straight	 Path	 whomever	 He	
wills
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 jinhoñ	 ne	 hamāri	 āayatieñ	 jhutlāyiñ	
bahre	aur	gooñge	haiñ	andheroñ	me	Allah	
jise	 chāhe	 gumrah	 kare	 aur	 jise	 chāhe	
seedhe	raste	dāl	de

arabicText: قُلْ أَرَءَيْتَكُمْ إِنْ أَتَىٰكُمْ عَذَابُ ٱللَّهِ أَوْ أَتَتْكُمُ ٱلسَّاعَةُ أَغَيْرَ ٱللَّهِ تَدْعُونَ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Say,	 “What	 is	 your	 opinion	 - if	 the	
punishment	 of	 Allah comes	 upon	 you	 or	
the	Hour	arrives,	will	you	call	upon	anyone	
(deity)	besides	Allah;	if	you	are	truthful?”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	 farmāo	bhalā	batāo	 to	agar	 tum	par	
Allah	kā	‘aƶāb	āaye	yā	qayāmat	qāyim	ho	
kyā	 Allah	 ke	 siwā	 kisi	 aur	 ko	 pukāro	 ge?	
agar	sachche	ho

arabicText: بَلْ إِيَّاهُ تَدْعُونَ فَيَكْشِفُ مَا تَدْعُونَ إِلَيْهِ إِن شَآءَ وَتَنسَوْنَ مَا تُشْرِكُونَ
englishTranslationText:
“In	fact	you	will	only	call	upon	Him,	and	if	
He	wills,	He	may	 remove	 that	 because	 of	
which	 you	 prayed	 to	 Him,	 and	 you	 will	
forget	the	partners	(you	ascribe	to	Him).”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Balke	usi	ko	pukāro	ge	to	woh	agar	chāhe	
jis	 par	 usey	 pukārte	 ho	 usey	 uthā	 le	 aur	
shareekoñ	ko	bhool	jāo	ge

arabicText: وَلَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَآ إِلَىٰٓ أُمَمٍۢ مِّن قَبْلِكَ فَأَخَذْنَـٰهُم بِٱلْبَأْسَآءِ وَٱلضَّرَّآءِ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَتَضَرَّعُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 We	 have	 indeed	 sent	 Noble	
Messengers	towards	the	nations	that	were	
before	you	- We	therefore	seized	them	with	hardship	and	adversity	so	that,	in	some	way,	they	
may	humbly	plead.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 be-shak	 	 hum	 ne	 tum	 se	 pahli	
ummatoñ	ki	taraf	Rasool	bheje	to	unheñ	sakhti	aur	takleef se	pakdā	ke	woh	kisi	tarah	gidgidāyeñ

arabicText: فَلَوْلَآ إِذْ جَآءَهُم بَأْسُنَا تَضَرَّعُوا۟ وَلَـٰكِن قَسَتْ قُلُوبُهُمْ وَزَيَّنَ لَهُمُ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ مَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
So	why	did	they	not	humbly	plead	when	Our	punishment	came	to	them?	But	their	hearts	were
hardened	and	the	devil	made	all	their	deeds	appear	good	to	them!
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	kyuñ	na	huā	ke	jab	un	par	hamāra	‘aƶāb	āaya		to	gidgidāye	hote	lekin	in	ke	to	dil	sakht	ho	gaye	
aur	shaitān	ne	in	ki	nigāh	me	bhale	kar	dikhāye

arabicText: فَلَمَّا نَسُوا۟ مَا ذُكِّرُوا۟ بِهِۦ فَتَحْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ أَبْوَٰبَ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا فَرِحُوا۟ بِمَآ أُوتُوٓا۟ أَخَذْنَـٰهُم بَغْتَةًۭ فَإِذَا هُم مُّبْلِسُونَ
englishTranslationText:
So	when	they	forgot	the	advices	made	to	them,	We	opened	the	gates	of	all	things	for	them;	to	the	
extent	that	when	they	were	rejoicing	for	what	they	had	received,	We	seized	them	suddenly,	hence	
they	remained	dejected.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Phir	 jab	 unhoñ	 ne	 bhulā	 diyā	 jo	 naseehatieñ	 un	 ko	 ki	 gayi	 thiñ hum	 ne	 un	 par	 har	 cheez	 ke	
darwāze	khol	diye	yahāñ	tak	ke	jab	khush	hue	us	par	jo	unheñ	milā	to	achānak	hum	ne	unheñ	
pakad	liyā	ab	woh	āas	toote	rah	gaye

arabicText: فَلَمَّا نَسُوا۟ مَا ذُكِّرُوا۟ بِهِۦ فَتَحْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ أَبْوَٰبَ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا فَرِحُوا۟ بِمَآ أُوتُوٓا۟ أَخَذْنَـٰهُم بَغْتَةًۭ فَإِذَا هُم مُّبْلِسُونَ
englishTranslationText:
So	when	they	forgot	the	advices	made	to	them,	We	opened	the	gates	of	all	things	for	them;	to	the	
extent	that	when	they	were	rejoicing	for	what	they	had	received,	We	seized	them	suddenly,	hence	
they	remained	dejected.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Phir	 jab	 unhoñ	 ne	 bhulā	 diyā	 jo	 naseehatieñ	 un	 ko	 ki	 gayi	 thiñ hum	 ne	 un	 par	 har	 cheez	 ke	
darwāze	khol	diye	yahāñ	tak	ke	jab	khush	hue	us	par	jo	unheñ	milā	to	achānak	hum	ne	unheñ	
pakad	liyā	ab	woh	āas	toote	rah	gaye

arabicText: فَقُطِعَ دَابِرُ ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ ۚ وَٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
The	 origins	 of	 the	 unjust	 people	 were	
therefore	cut	off;	and	all	praise	is	to	Allah,	
Lord	Of	The	Creation.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	 jad	 kāt	 di	 gayi	 zālimoñ	 ki; aur	 sab	
khoobiyoñ	sarāha	Allah, Rab	sāre	jahāñ	kā

arabicText: قُلْ أَرَءَيْتُمْ إِنْ أَخَذَ ٱللَّهُ سَمْعَكُمْ وَأَبْصَـٰرَكُمْ وَخَتَمَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِكُم مَّنْ إِلَـٰهٌ غَيْرُ ٱللَّهِ يَأْتِيكُم بِهِ ۗ ٱنظُرْ كَيْفَ نُصَرِّفُ ٱلْـَٔايَـٰتِ ثُمَّ هُمْ يَصْدِفُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Say,	“What	is	your	opinion	- if	Allah were	
to	take	away	your	hearing	and	your	sight	
and	 seal	 your	 hearts,	 then	is	 there	a	God	
besides	 Allah who	 could	 restore	 it	 for	
you?”	Observe	how	We	explain	the	verses	
to	them,	yet	they	turn	away!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	 farmāo	 bhalā	 batāo	 to	 agar	 Allah	
tumhāre	kān	āañkh	le	le	aur	tumhāre	diloñ	
par	mohar	 kar	 de	 	to	Allah	 ke	 siwā	 kaun		
khudā	 hai	 ke	 tumheñ	 	 yeh	 cheez	 la	 de	
dekho	hum	kis	kis	rang	se	āayatieñ	bayān	
karte	haiñ	phir	woh	muñh		pher	lete	haiñ	.

arabicText: قُلْ أَرَءَيْتَكُمْ إِنْ أَتَىٰكُمْ عَذَابُ ٱللَّهِ بَغْتَةً أَوْ جَهْرَةً هَلْ يُهْلَكُ إِلَّا ٱلْقَوْمُ ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Say,	 “What	 is	 your	 opinion	 - if	 the	
punishment	 of	 Allah were	 to	 come	 upon	
you	 suddenly	 or	 openly	 (with	
forewarning),	 who	 would	 be	 destroyed	
except	the	disbelieving	people?”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	 farmāo	bhalā	batāo	 to	agar	 tum	par	
Allah	 kā	 ‘aƶāb	 āaye	 achānak	 yā	 khullam	
khullā	to	kaun		tabāh	hogā	siwā	zālimoñ	ke

arabicText: وَمَا نُرْسِلُ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ إِلَّا مُبَشِّرِينَ وَمُنذِرِينَ ۖ فَمَنْ ءَامَنَ وَأَصْلَحَ فَلَا خَوْفٌ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا هُمْ يَحْزَنُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 We	 did	 not	 send	 Noble	 Messengers	
except	 as	 Heralds	 of	 glad	 tidings	 and	
warnings;	so	upon	those	who	accept	faith	
and	 reform	 themselves,	 shall	 be	 no	 fear	
nor	shall	they	grieve.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 hum	 nahi	 bhejte	 Rasooloñ	 ko	 magar	
Khushi	aur	dar	sunāte	to	jo	Imān		lāye	aur	
sañwre	un	ko	na	kuchh	andeshah	na	kuchh	
gham.

arabicText: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا يَمَسُّهُمُ ٱلْعَذَابُ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَفْسُقُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 those	 who	 deny	 Our	 signs	 - the	
punishment	 will	 afflict	 them	 for	 their	
disobedience
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jinhoñ	ne	hamāri	Āayatieñ		jhutlāyeñ	
unheñ	‘aƶāb	pahuñche	gā	badla	un	 ki	behukmi	kā
